Pentair Reviews FAQs

Is Pentair a good company to work for?

Pentair has an overall rating of 3.4 Average Rating out of 5, based on over 27 Pentair Review Ratings left anonymously by Pentair employees, which is 13% lower than the average rating for all companies on CareerBliss. 85% of employees would recommend working at Pentair.

Does Pentair pay their employees well?

Pentair employees earn $61,000 annually on average, or $29 per hour, which is 8% lower than the national salary average of $66,000 per year. 9 Pentair employees have shared their salaries on CareerBliss. Find Pentair Salaries by Job Title.

How satisfied are employees working at Pentair?

85% of employees would recommend working at Pentair with the overall rating of 3.4 out of 5. Employees also rated Pentair 3.1 out of 5 for Company Culture, 3.2 for Rewards You Receive, 3.1 for Growth Opportunities and 3.2 for support you get.

What is the highest paying job at Pentair?

According to our data, the highest paying job at Pentair is a General Manager at $156,000 annually. Browse Pentair Salaries by Job Profile.

What is the lowest paying job at Pentair?

According to our data, the lowest paying job at Pentair is a Production Worker at $20,000 annually. Browse Pentair Salaries by Job Profile.

What are the pros and cons of working at Pentair?

According to reviews on CareerBliss, employees commonly rated the pros of working at Pentair to be Company Culture, Growth Opportunities, People You Work With and Person You Work For, and no cons.
